name: Miracle Ejector
text:
(This card is always treated as an "Elemental HERO" card.)
You can send 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell/Trap that mentions an "Elemental HERO" monster's card name from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it. You can only use each effect of "Miracle Ejector" once per turn.
